textBox.richText: Thinking about living in Drama House for the 2008-2009 academic year? If you are interested in being a part of a diverse and arts-oriented community, please consider Drama House to be the place for you! Download the house application above and hand it in to housing committee chair Martin Cozens (Room 207) by March 21st at Midnight. If you have any questions regarding Drama House, feel free to contact us via the email address below, or stop by the house and talk with house members at any time! dramahouse@gmail.com
Apply to Live in Drama House!
